line.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 4; transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0);

text.style: fill: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11.8px; font-weight: 700; white-space: pre;
